# Class BookVersions.Code.VersionClass_precedingVersionReference=Preceding version reference

# Page Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newPage=New page BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle=Page title BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle.hint=The title of the page. BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned=Unversioned content BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned.hint=When the page is unversioned, the option of creating different content for multiple versions will be disabled and the same content of the page will be displayed in all versions of the book. It will be possible, though, to switch back to versioned content. BookVersions.creationForm.create=Create BookVersions.creationForm.add=Add BookVersions.creationForm.name=Name BookVersions.creationForm.libTitle=Library title

# Variant Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newVariant=New variant
# Library Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newLibrary=Add library
# Navigation menu BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect=Version BookVersions.navMenu.versioned=Content from version [{0}]. BookVersions.navMenu.inherited=Content inherited from version [{0}]. BookVersions.navMenu.createVersionWithLink=Create content for version {0} BookVersions.navMenu.warning.noversion=The page is versioned, but it doesn''t have content for version {0} or its preceding versions. BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect=Variant BookVersions.navMenu.contentForVariant= BookVersions.navMenu.pageIsNotAssociated=Page not linked to variant [{0}]. BookVersions.navMenu.pageAvailableForAll=Page is not restricted to a variant. BookVersions.navMenu.associateVariantWithLink=Link page to variant [{0}]
# Administration menu BookVersions.adminMenu.title=Versions BookVersions.adminMenu.manage=Manage BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVersions=Versions BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVariants=Variants BookVersions.adminMenu.manageLibraries=Libraries BookVersions.adminMenu.pageActions=Page Actions BookVersions.adminMenu.addPageToVariant=Link page to variant [{0}] BookVersions.adminMenu.removePageFromVariant=Unlink page from variant [{0}] BookVersions.adminMenu.publishLable=Publishing BookVersions.navMenu.convertToUnversioned=Convert to unversioned BookVersions.navMenu.convertToVersioned=Convert to versioned BookVersions.adminMenu.statusLable=Status BookVersions.adminMenu.publish=Publish current version BookVersions.adminMenu.librariesText=The following libraries are configured to be used in the current book. To edit the configuration, go to the Versions administration page of the book and edit the version pages.
